body: Thanks water guy. The second one is definitely more manga than hentai. I liked the developments there more than this.
there is a second volume where we meet his mother and their neighbor who complains about the noise, it's really good it's on myreadingmanga, you should definitely check it out if you liked the first
Very Underrated! I read this almost a year ago and enjoyed it a lot. I have found it again after looking for ages and I'm very glad
